title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin believes Kirk Cousins is holding back the Vikings after he was outplayed by a backup quarterback on Sunday Night Football. He shares one team he thinks is back into playoff contention and catching the rest of the league by surprise. He also tells you why he was right about Odell Beckham Jr and wrong about the Packers. Plus, former Falcons general manager Thomas Dimitroff joins the show to discuss the importance of elite wide receivers in today's NFL. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
